com.simsilica.lemur.event

Class BaseAppState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.lemur.event.BaseAppState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.app.state.AppState
    Deprecated. 
    Replaced by com.jme3.app.state.BaseAppState

    public abstract class BaseAppState
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.jme3.app.state.AppState
    Base class app state that includes built-in convenience for enable/disable/initialize state management. The abstract enable() and disable() methods are called appropriately during initialize(), terminate(), or setEnabled() depending on the mutual state of "initialized" and "enabled".
